name: Men's Denim Jacket
shortDescription: Classic men’s denim jacket, perfect for casual wear.
longDescription: This men’s denim jacket is made of high-quality denim material that ensures durability and comfort. It features a classic fit, button-down front, and two chest pockets. Perfect for casual outings or layering over a hoodie. Available in multiple washes for different styles.

name: Women's Hoodie
shortDescription: Soft and warm hoodie for women, available in multiple colors.
longDescription: This women’s hoodie is crafted from soft cotton blend fabric providing maximum comfort and warmth. It comes with a front kangaroo pocket, adjustable drawstring hood, and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for casual wear, workouts, or lounging at home. Multiple vibrant colors available to suit your style.

name: Kids T-Shirt
shortDescription: High-quality cotton t-shirts for kids, comfortable and durable.
longDescription: These kids’ t-shirts are made from 100% soft cotton, ensuring breathability and comfort throughout the day. Designed with fun prints and vibrant colors, they are perfect for playtime, school, or casual outings. Machine washable and durable, making them ideal for active kids.

name: Formal Shirt Men
shortDescription: Elegant formal shirt suitable for office and events.
longDescription: This formal shirt is tailored from premium cotton fabric providing a crisp look and comfortable wear. It features a button-down collar, long sleeves with button cuffs, and a sleek fit suitable for office or special occasions. Available in classic colors to complement any formal outfit.

name: Casual Pants
shortDescription: Comfortable casual pants for men and women.
longDescription: These casual pants are made from lightweight and breathable fabric, perfect for everyday wear. Featuring an elastic waistband, side pockets, and a relaxed fit, they offer maximum comfort while maintaining a stylish look. Suitable for work-from-home, casual outings, or travel.

name: Men's Polo Shirt
shortDescription: Comfortable polo shirt for everyday casual wear.
longDescription: This men’s polo shirt is made from breathable cotton fabric that ensures all-day comfort. It features a classic collar, button placket, and a regular fit suitable for office casual or weekend wear. Easy to maintain and durable for long-term use.

name: Women's Casual Kurti
shortDescription: Stylish casual kurti for daily and office wear.
longDescription: This women’s kurti is designed with soft, breathable fabric ensuring comfort throughout the day. It features a modern cut with elegant patterns, making it suitable for office, casual outings, or small gatherings. Easy to wash and color durable.

name: Winter Sweater
shortDescription: Warm and cozy sweater for winter season.
longDescription: This winter sweater is made from premium wool-blend material that provides excellent warmth without compromising comfort. It features ribbed cuffs and a snug fit, making it ideal for cold weather. Suitable for both casual and semi-formal wear.

name: Men's Chino Pants
shortDescription: Slim-fit chino pants suitable for office and casual wear.
longDescription: These men’s chino pants are tailored from high-quality cotton fabric offering comfort and a smart look. Designed with a slim-fit cut, belt loops, and side pockets, they are perfect for office wear or casual outings.

name: Kids Hoodie
shortDescription: Soft and warm hoodie for kids.
longDescription: This kids hoodie is made from soft fleece fabric that keeps children warm and comfortable. Designed with a front pocket and hood, it is perfect for winter days and outdoor activities. Durable stitching ensures long-lasting use.

name: Denim Jeans
shortDescription: Classic blue denim jeans for men.
longDescription: These denim jeans are crafted from premium stretchable denim fabric for comfort and durability. Featuring a classic five-pocket design and modern fit, they are perfect for daily wear and casual outings.

name: Women's Long Skirt
shortDescription: Elegant long skirt for casual and festive wear.
longDescription: This women’s long skirt is made from lightweight flowing fabric that provides comfort and elegance. Designed with a flattering fit and vibrant patterns, it is suitable for casual outings and festive occasions alike.
